entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind south 40 km/h becoming southeast 20 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:56 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 07:56 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
